price: I reče: "Ja sam sam sebi zulum učinio, pa oprosti mi!" I On mu oprosti, On je, zaista, Oprostitelj grijeha, Milostivi.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِي فَٱغۡفِرۡ لِي فَغَفَرَ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī ẓalamtu nafsī fa-igh'fir lī faghafara lahu innahu huwa al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
